item.title: Review: The Final Frontier
item.description: Iron Maiden's latest album, "The Final Frontier", is the truest return to form any metal band has made in the last decade. Without a shadow of a doubt.
item.author: The Rocker

item.title: Welcome to Alt.ernative

item.title: Welcome to Project Nightlife
item.description: Project Nightlife is the hottest new music, nightlife and fashion resource. We've recruited a team of excitingly talented bloggers whose passion and creativity will transpire to a wealth of information available to you at the click of a button.
item.author: Project Nightlife
